1.8.9.4.0.0: Added parenthesis and OOPS. Full changes: https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/minecalc/files/2392293
1.8.9.3.1.4: Fixed exponents when not the first function. Added check for imaginary numbers dealing with exponents.
1.8.9.3.1.2: Added Translation support. Default command is now /calc. Implemented Forge's update checker.
1.8.9.3.1.0: Allowed editing the config ingame via the Mods menu.
1.8.9.3.0.0: Spaces aren't required to separate arguments. Removed rootTimes config option.
